subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Terry Francona, who helped the Cleveland Indians improve by 24 games and reach the playoffs for the first time in six years, was named American League manager of the year on Tuesday.
snippet: Terry Francona, who helped the Cleveland Indians improve by 24 games and reach the playoffs for the first time in six years, was named American League manager of the year on Tuesday.
